name: N1rV4nA: Synthwave Racing Action
description:
Beat your infamous rival to become the King on the streets of Neo-X in an exhilarating 2D bit graphics drag racing game! Jump off ramps and use all the speed boosts at your disposal to achieve nirvana while jamming to synthwave!

Control your throttle and angle to precisely hit all the landings and pass your rival by letting go of gas before speed bumps and hitting boosts! After taking him down in normal mode try HARD mode to become the true King!

N1rV4nA was a 2 week solo project for my class in Game Design! You can check out the development post at my WordPress!
